PaymentRequestPaymentmethodchange_event.summary: The paymentmethodchange event is delivered the Payment Request API to a object when the user changes the payment method within a given payment handler.

remarks.para: For example, if the user switches from one credit card to another on their Apple Pay account, a paymentmethodchange event is fired to let you know about the change.
This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
